title: [Yegharren Plain, Veldt]
description: Several large grasshoppers leap from the field near the path, extending their buzzing wings to fly for a few seconds before disappearing into a new grassy hideout away from the disturbance.  The wind whistles down from the high moors to the east, bringing a faint scent of something desolate and unwholesome along with the cooling air.

Several large grasshoppers leap from the darkness of the field near the path, extending their buzzing wings to fly for a few seconds before disappearing into a new grassy hideout away from the disturbance.  The wind whistles down from the high moors to the east, bringing a faint scent of something desolate and unwholesome along with the cooling air.
paths: Obvious paths: north, northeast, west, northwest
